message: I propose dividing the money in a 70-30 ratio, with you receiving $300,000. Let me know if this works for you.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not being generous
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted our proposal to a 60-40 split, with you receiving $400,000. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the decrease in value of the money.
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to be generous
